txt.en: The vile Shorábakh has taken Meremband, the Joyous Court. If the White Company is to gain control over the city, this minion of Minas Morgul must be removed.
Shorábakh can be found at Meremband upon the Circle of Death.\n\nYou should defeat Shorábakh.
The vile Shorábakh has taken Meremband and must be removed.
Shorábakh can be found at Meremband upon the Circle of Death.\n\nYou should defeat Shorábakh.
You have defeated the vile Shorábakh and provided a great service to the White Company. Their efforts to reclaim Minas Ithil are now ever closer thanks to you.
